div.a: How Microsoft's Trojan Horse Took Over Your Living Room

div.div: A seven-year-old gaming console has evolved into a top contender for the web TV crown.

div.a: Accuser Recants Allegation Against Elmo Puppeteer

div.div: The man who accused Kevin Clash, the voice and puppeteer of the “Sesame Street” character Elmo, of an underage sexual relationship has recanted that claim, his lawyer said on Tuesday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QbA8je&via=Digg&text=Accuser Recants Allegation Against Elmo Puppeteer

div.a: This Man Was Busted On The Autobahn With The Craziest Mobile Office We've Ever Seen

div.div: The 35-year-old driver was pulled over for passing a car at 80 mph in a 62 zone on the Autobahn. It was then that the police found his setup.

An amused Daring Fireball reader sent in this photo of an ad from Dell for their new XPS 12, “a powerful laptop and tablet in one.

div.a: One Chart That Explains How The United States Became The World's Biggest Debtor

div.div: As the high-stakes wrangling over the fiscal cliff gets underway, we though it might be the proper moment to remind everybody just how the United States managed to become the world’s biggest debtor.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UmF3Jq&via=Digg&text=One Chart That Explains How The United States Became The World's Biggest Debtor

div.a: The Incredibly Creepy Noise One World Trade Made As Hurricane Sandy Approached

div.div: “What a horrible sound,” says the man with the camera, treated to the unexpected and eerie musical whirls of wind through the partially-constructed One World Trade.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UBll2G&via=Digg&text=The Incredibly Creepy Noise One World Trade Made As Hurricane Sandy Approached

div.a: David Petraeus Is In The Next 'Call Of Duty' As Secretary Of Defense

div.div: A sex scandal may have prompted David Petraeus to resign from running the CIA last Friday, but the new "Call of Duty" predicts that he's got a really bright future.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RQHxCW&via=Digg&text=David Petraeus Is In The Next 'Call Of Duty' As Secretary Of Defense

div.a: Your House Is Killing You: Here Are 7 Ways To Stop It

div.div: A roundup of the high- and low-tech solutions to mitigate dangerous concentrations of airborne chemicals at home

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SjCszH&via=Digg&text=Your House Is Killing You: Here Are 7 Ways To Stop It

div.a: Charge Your Cellphone With A Tap Or A Shake

div.div: Need to make a call but run out of juice? Just give your cellphone a shake for an extra burst of power - that's the idea behind a new cellphone charger that turns movement into energy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TD2CwM&via=Digg&text=Charge Your Cellphone With A Tap Or A Shake

div.a: Foxconn Allegedly Replacing Human Workers With Robots

div.div: Foxconn has been planning to buy 1 million robots to replace human workers and it looks like that change, albeit gradual, is about to start.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QEV6qs&via=Digg&text=Foxconn Allegedly Replacing Human Workers With Robots

div.a: How Come Smell-O-Vision Never Took Off?

div.div: The the first (and last) Smell-O-Vision movie was "Scent of Mystery," where the murderer was revealed by the smell of his pipe tobacco. Why didn't this technology ever take off?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYiosY&via=Digg&text=How Come Smell-O-Vision Never Took Off?

div.div: IF A COMPANION CUBE IS IN FREE FALL...

div.a: How 'Portal 2' Developers Became The Best 6th Grade Physics Teachers Ever

div.div: The game developers at Valve stumbled into the learning business, and then won the hearts of teachers (and students) everywhere by creating the Portal 2 Puzzle Maker.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PRADgT&via=Digg&text=How 'Portal 2' Developers Became The Best 6th Grade Physics Teachers Ever

div.a: Can Digital Drugs Get You High?

div.div: About a month ago, a scientist in the United Arab Emirates started making noise about banning something called “binaural beats,” which he referred to as “digital drugs.” These are audio tracks—calling them “music” would be a bit of a stretch—that you can buy online for $16.95 or less. But do they really get you high?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RIb3KZ&via=Digg&text=Can Digital Drugs Get You High?

div.div: WHAT PLUMBERS DON'T WANT YOU TO KNOW
Watch this video about how to fix basic problems with you toilet and take yourself out to dinner on the money you've saved by not calling the plumber.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XyYDso&via=Digg&text=How To Fix A Toilet

div.a: How Speed Daters Decide Who's Hot, Who's Not

div.div: For speed daters, first impressions are everything. But it’s more than just whether someone is hot or not.

div.a: I Lived A CIA Conspiracy Theory

div.div: "Did I accidentally force David Petraeus to resign? No. Do people believe I did? Maybe."

div.a: Dumpster Diving In New York City

div.div: In “Spoils,” three New Yorkers embark on an intimate journey through the culture of dumpster diving, illuminating a practice as old as agriculture.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SWZmQu&via=Digg&text=Dumpster Diving In New York City

div.a: The Full 'Haunted Toaster' Segment Is Too Incredible Too Believed

div.div: "The devil toaster was part of a story I did on supermarket tabloids. It also included an interview with a man saved from an icy lake by his Howdy Doody dummy, and an interview with a woman who had sex with aliens for several years. Here's the complete story."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TDiuPL&via=Digg&text=The Full 'Haunted Toaster' Segment Is Too Incredible Too Believed

div.a: Why Google, Not Facebook, Knows Your Darkest Secrets

div.div: It's Google, the social also-ran, that knows your real secrets. It knows the things you wouldn't ask your friends. It knows things you can't ask your spouse. It knows the things you haven't asked your doctor yet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UASRG5&via=Digg&text=Why Google, Not Facebook, Knows Your Darkest Secrets

div.a: The Crazy Secret Journal Of Anti-Virus Founder John McAfee

div.div: In September of this year, McAfee published a diary in three parts of his recent "adventures" in Belize on a private message board, where he described how his life had been transformed. He called the story "Darkness Falls."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UERUXO&via=Digg&text=The Crazy Secret Journal Of Anti-Virus Founder John McAfee

div.a: Why The Guy Who Built Windows 8 Left Microsoft Just As It Released

div.div: The announcement of Steven Sinofsky’s ouster from Microsoft came late on Monday, so the story has only begun to be reported. Here is what various news organizations and bloggers are saying.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SJPHKv&via=Digg&text=Why The Guy Who Built Windows 8 Left Microsoft Just As It Released

div.div: The biggest thing in music this year? A supercharged version of something that nearly died in the '90s: the rave. Gideon Lewis-Kraus reports from the Electric Daisy Carnival, a three-ight (and surprisingly polite) bacchanal where international DJs spin for 100,000 wasted hedonists scantily dressed in furry underwear.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RHl1fK&via=Digg&text=Dance Dance Revolution

div.a: Here's The Email Trick Petraeus Used To Communicate With His Mistress

div.div: CIA Director David Petraeus and Paula Broadwell, a former military intelligence officer and his biographer, adopted a well-worn online trick, in an apparent attempt to keep their communications secret.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W5q08p&via=Digg&text=Here's The Email Trick Petraeus Used To Communicate With His Mistress
